attributes.action: Recall the Royal Navy and RAF deployed to support Israel
attributes.additional_details:
They have endured bombing, restrictions to freedom of movement, a blockade of food, fuel and medicine.

The world cries out against the deaths of innocent civilians in Israel killed by terrorism.
There are nearly one million innocent children in Gaza. It has been reported that over 2000 children have been killed in Gaza in this war alone. 

Please sign this petition. Send a message loud and clear to the UK Government: The UK does not support Israel's military action in Gaza. Recall the Royal Navy and RAF.
attributes.background:
I work for the UK Civil Service. I will no longer stay silent, no matter the personal cost.
The Palestinian population in the West Bank and Gaza have endured decades of of what is widely regarded to be an illegal occupation.
